messages.author: user1
messages.message: Hi there, can your AI data API handle large CSV files in real time?

messages.author: chatbot
messages.message: Yes, our API can handle CSVs up to 1GB in size using the parseCSV() endpoint.

messages.author: user1
messages.message: Great, that works!

messages.author: user2
messages.message: Hello, is it possible to export JSON summaries directly from the AI data API?

messages.author: chatbot
messages.message: Absolutely. You can use the /export endpoint to receive a JSON summary of your dataset.

messages.author: user2
messages.message: Perfect! Thanks.

messages.author: user3
messages.message: Does the AI data API support direct Slack integration?

messages.author: chatbot
messages.message: No, we do not offer Slack integration at this time.

messages.author: user3
messages.message: Bummer, that doesn't work for me.

messages.author: user4
messages.message: My calls are failing with a 500 error. Any idea why?

messages.author: chatbot
messages.message: Have you tried clearing your cache and disabling all your extensions?

messages.author: user4
messages.message: That has nothing to do with the API usage. This is not helpful.

messages.author: user5
messages.message: Hi, can the AI data API auto-detect column headers in my CSV?

messages.author: chatbot
messages.message: Yes, just pass the parameter 'auto_headers=true' in your request.

messages.author: user5
messages.message: Great, thanks for the tip!

messages.author: user6
messages.message: Does the AI data API offer real-time data streaming for sensor data?

messages.author: chatbot
messages.message: Yes, you can subscribe to our WebSocket endpoint to receive real-time events.

messages.author: user6
messages.message: Awesome! Exactly what I needed.

messages.author: user7
messages.message: I want to transform my JSON data into CSV automatically. Is that possible?

messages.author: chatbot
messages.message: Sorry, that feature is not supported yet.

messages.author: user7
messages.message: That’s really disappointing. I guess I'll look elsewhere.

messages.author: user8
messages.message: Is there a way to limit the number of rows returned from the AI data API?

messages.author: chatbot
messages.message: Yes, add a 'max_rows' query parameter in your GET request.

messages.author: user8
messages.message: Great, that works for me!

messages.author: user9
messages.message: I'm seeing an error saying 'Invalid token' even though I have a valid API key. What do I do?

messages.author: chatbot
messages.message: Try resetting your token in the developer dashboard. That usually resolves it.

messages.author: user9
messages.message: Thanks, I'll do that. Hope it fixes the issue!

messages.author: user10
messages.message: My request returns random HTML data, not JSON. Am I doing something wrong?

messages.author: chatbot
messages.message: It might be that you need to specify 'Content-Type: application/xml'.

messages.author: user10
messages.message: That's not correct—I'm looking for JSON, not XML. This is useless.
